Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO INTERNET AND TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to prohibiting the paying of ransom in the event of a cyber-attack
Summary: Prohibits any municipal corporation or other government entity from paying ransom in the event of a cyber-attack against such municipal corporation's or government entity's critical infrastructure.
LawCode: Add ยง70-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting the paying of ransom in the event of a cyber-attack
